relationships.description: Steven Elkman is a Managing Director and Client Advisor at Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown

analysis.purpose: Forwarding a humorous political joke/story to recipients
analysis.significance: Shows informal communication between financial professionals containing political humor

notable_quotes: 'Class, you should be ashamed of yourselves, Little Hodiaki isn't from this country and he knows more about our history than you do.'
'Michael Jackson to the child witnesses testifying against him, 2004.'

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a forwarded political joke/story that was likely circulating via email in 2011

analysis.summary: This is a forwarded email containing a humorous political joke about a Japanese exchange student named Little Hodiaki who correctly attributes famous historical quotes to various American political figures and controversial statements. The email was sent by Steven Elkman, a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank, and appears to be informal office communication.
